commit_msg:
Fixes bug where applying the Torch interface repeatedly after expansion caused an error (#1223)

* Fixes bug where repeated Torch interface after expansion caused an error

* update changelog

* Update .github/CHANGELOG.md

* Update .github/CHANGELOG.md

Co-authored-by: Tom Bromley <49409390+trbromley@users.noreply.github.com>

author_comment: Fixer: "Applying the Torch interface, twice, to an expanded tape, resulted in an error. This is because the expand() function was not retaining the __bare__ attribute of the tape, which stores the original (pre-interface) class of the tape."
